name: Powa!
description:
Help Powa! to get back to the village.

-More than 4 different worlds

-Compatible with GameBoy Color, Super GameBoy and original GameBoy (DMG)

-Awesome music by sergeeo

-Majestic cover, box art and additional ingame graphics by Ivan Miguel

An old-school game to play on your favourite handheld

NEW -> Physical copies finally available here!

Downloadable demo of the first 6 levels! this demo does not have intro nor difficulty selector, the full version has both
